item.title: Agile security testing — pentest and automate
item.description: Security testers are challenged by both the attackers, who actively search for vulnerabilities to exploit, and the need for test automation. Some security tests can be created automatically by tools, but mostly security testing is exploratory manual work and it is ineffective to design test cases beforehand.
